channel.title: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail
channel.description:
I need help with unmute, unipmute, unban, unipban, unjail commands, if anybody knows how to add those that would be greatly appreciated.
-Thanks.

item.title: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 1) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.toX = 3080; p.toY = 3250; p.action = 0; p.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName); sM ("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+"."); checkDupe(); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail.."); }

un jail theres a start

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail

item.source: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail

item.title: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:8, topic:262202”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=346279.msg2667784#msg2667784 date=1234666968]

You gotta add the commands so they do things, heres ipban:

If [command= "ipban"] substring=check banips.txt sendMessage "your iped!!"

add that into your commands

That command would never work…
You can’t use [] instead of ()…
And for the sendMessage part, the string needs to be within a set of parenthesis.
[/quote]

lol at that code

well im not sure if there is a easier way for the unip but create a method like appendunIPBanned() and declare it to unwrite the last known connextion from the banned ips.

unjail is easy.
take you jail command and change the subtring to match “unjail” and change all the actions to = 0

unmute is easy also

if (command.startswith(“unmute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
muted = false;
}[/quote]
I think there’s a bit more to the unmute command.
You can’t just make it false; you have to remove it from the muted.txt file.

Just look around, you’ll find it.
I’m just too lazy to give you the code right now.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail

item.title: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:5, topic:262202”][quote author=Bubbsy7 link=topic=346279.msg2667767#msg2667767 date=1234666681]
You gotta add the commands so they do things, heres ipban:

If [command= "ipban"] substring=check banips.txt sendMessage "your iped!!"

add that into your commands
[/quote]
That command would never work…
You can’t use [] instead of ()…
And for the sendMessage part, the string needs to be within a set of parenthesis.[/quote]

lol at that code

well im not sure if there is a easier way for the unip but create a method like appendunIPBanned() and declare it to unwrite the last known connextion from the banned ips.

unjail is easy.
take you jail command and change the subtring to match “unjail” and change all the actions to = 0

unmute is easy also

if (command.startswith(“unmute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
muted = false;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with unmute, unban, unjail
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Bubbsy7, post:3, topic:262202”]You gotta add the commands so they do things, heres ipban:

If [command= "ipban"] substring=check banips.txt sendMessage "your iped!!"

add that into your commands[/quote]
That command would never work…
You can’t use [] instead of ()…
And for the sendMessage part, the string needs to be within a set of parenthesis.
